content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed the shell command to activate the environment as instructed by an AI response. However, the command returned an error message stating that the source command could not be found.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "source $HOME/miniconda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate && echo 'Environment activated.'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b''
STDERR:
b'/bin/sh: 1: source: not found\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "source $HOME/miniconda/bin/activate && echo 'Environment activated.'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
